To reduce spam and help you focus on what matters most, we’re removing notifications generated from mentions in commit messages. Previously, mentioning a user or team in a commit message (e.g., fixes bug for @username) triggered a notification, just like in issues or pull requests.

### What’s changing

On December 8th, Users and teams will no longer receive notifications when mentioned in a commit message. Mentions in issues, pull requests, and discussions **will continue** to trigger notifications.

### How to give feedback

If you have any feedback or questions, feel free to drop a comment in our [Community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/178738).
